summary: Beth, a bookish teenager, befriends Emilia, an aspiring novelist who has just arrived in town. Emilia soon begins an affair with Beth's father that threatens to have devastating consequences.
cast: Jessica Brown Findlay|Harry Treadaway|Josef Altin|Felicity Jones|Julia Ormond|Justin Edwards|Sebastian Koch|David Cann|Sheila Monaghan|Katie Overd|Billy Seymour|Alexis Zegerman|Chandra Ruegg|Marie-France Alvarez|Hazel Douglas|Peter Vaughan|Kenneth Collard|Thomas Brodie-Sangster|Laura Power|Mark Ryder|Arthur Nightingale|Angus Barnett|Louisa Bawden|James Richard Marshall
title: Albatross
